quote.quotepara: I just installed MultiZilla for the second time, this time version 1.8.1.1c. I advise anybody to do not! MultiZilla isn't yet compatible with Seamonkey. Several problems occured after installing MZ like:
-blue title-bars on the pages in the multizilla-preference-windows stayed empty
-starting up with the homepage wasn't possible anymore (it turned into blank every time, whatever I did in the navigator startup-window)
-icons on the MultiZilla tabbar stayed empty after using them once (they turned to blank/white and didn't show the icon anymore)

I was very glad that just before I installed MozBack, so that I could bring the system back to normal. I ask HJ to test MZ thoroughly before bringing up a new release. For I hope to use the functionality of MZ in SeaMonkey once in a proper way.

body.para: I had the same problem with MZ. What I did is install a new (clean) version of SeaMonkey with NO other extensions. MZ seems to work fine. When I tried to install google bar, color tabs et al, everything went south. You would not need color tabs or google bar with MZ anyway. I also think some themes may make things go wrong.
